attributes.action: Increase Self Employed National Insurance contributions in line with PAYE (OR) Reduce PAYE Contributions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a PAYE Employee it is disgraceful that I can be expected to pay National Insurance contributions of around £230 per month whilst Self Employed people,who are often already finding reasons to avoid paying taxes, can be expected to pay of the order of £2-4 per week yet expect the same access to the NHS, State Pensions etc.

I request that either Self Employed contributions should be evened out by an introduction on one hand and a reduction on the other.
